languages.text: "Азуриани тратят десятилетия на укрепление духа, прежде чем прикоснуться к вуали. Вы же, не обладая даром времени, тщитесь совладать с силами, которые только рады вашему невежеству".

traits.locale_text: "Неудивительно, что вас постигла неудача. Азуриани тратят десятилетия на укрепление духа, прежде чем прикоснуться к вуали. Вы же, не обладая даром времени, тщитесь совладать с силами, которые только рады вашему невежеству".

languages.text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
languages.original_text: "Азуриани тратят десятилетия на укрепление духа, прежде чем прикоснуться к вуали. Вы же, не обладая даром времени, тщитесь совладать с силами, которые только рады вашему невежеству".

traits.locale_text: "The Asuryani spend decades to temper their spirit before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, but seek to harness the powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades to temper their spirit before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, but seek to harness the powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness the powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness the powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness the powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
"The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

languages.text: «Los Asuryani dedican décadas a templar sus espíritus antes de tocar el velo. Careces del don del tiempo, y aun así pretendes utilizar poderes que se ríen de tu ignorancia».
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: «Los Asuryani dedican décadas a templar sus espíritus antes de tocar el velo. Careces del don del tiempo, y aun así pretendes utilizar poderes que se ríen de tu ignorancia».

languages.text: 「アシュリヤーニ はヴェールに触れる前に、何十年もかけて魂を和らげる。あなたには時の才能がないのに、自分の無知を喜ぶだけの力を利用しようとしている。」
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリヤーニ はヴェールに触れる前に、何十年もかけて魂を和らげる。あなたには時の才能がないのに、自分の無知を喜ぶだけの力を利用しようとしている。」

languages.text: “方舟灵族在触碰面纱之前，要先花上数十年的时间锻炼灵魂。你们缺乏时间的馈赠，却妄图驾驭这种力量，你们的无知让它欣喜若狂。”
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: “方舟灵族在触碰面纱之前，要先花上数十年的时间锻炼灵魂。你们缺乏时间的馈赠，却妄图驾驭这种力量，你们的无知让它欣喜若狂。”

languages.text: "Die Asuryani haben Jahrzehnte damit verbracht, ihren Geist zu mäßigen, bevor sie den Schleier berührt haben. Euch fehlt die Gunst der Zeit, dennoch wollt Ihr Kräfte nutzen, denen Eure Unwissenheit nur gelegen kommt."
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: "Die Asuryani haben Jahrzehnte damit verbracht, ihren Geist zu mäßigen, bevor sie den Schleier berührt haben. Euch fehlt die Gunst der Zeit, dennoch wollt Ihr Kräfte nutzen, denen Eure Unwissenheit nur gelegen kommt."

languages.text: « Les Asuryanis passent des décennies à fortifier leur esprit avant de toucher le voile. Le temps vous manque, et pourtant, vous cherchez à exploiter des puissances qui se réjouissent de votre ignorance. »
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: « Les Asuryanis passent des décennies à fortifier leur esprit avant de toucher le voile. Le temps vous manque, et pourtant, vous cherchez à exploiter des puissances qui se réjouissent de votre ignorance. »

languages.text: "Asuryaniler, örtüye dokunmadan önce ruhlarını ıslak etmek için onlarca yıl harcadı. Sana böylesi uzun bir ömür bahşedilmedi. Yine de cehaletin karşısında memnuniyetten başka bir şey bilmeyen güçleri dizginlemeye çalışıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "The Asuryani spend decades tempering their spirits before touching the veil. You lack the gift of time, yet you seek to harness powers that are only too pleased with your ignorance."
